trans-unit.source: Retrieves the location of the theme property definition for a property

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the location of the theme property definition for a property

target.mrk: Retrieves the location of the theme property definition for a property

trans-unit.source: Handle to a window's specified theme data.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to a window's specified theme data.

target.mrk: Handle to a window's specified theme data.

trans-unit.source: The part that contains the theme.

seg-source.mrk: The part that contains the theme.

target.mrk: The part that contains the theme.

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates where the property was found. It can be one of the following values.

seg-source.mrk: The value that indicates where the property was found.
It can be one of the following values.

target.mrk: The value that indicates where the property was found.
It can be one of the following values.

trans-unit.source: 0 - Property was found in the state section.

seg-source.mrk: 0 - Property was found in the state section.

target.mrk: 0 - Property was found in the state section.

trans-unit.source: 1 - Property was found in the part section.

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Property was found in the part section.

target.mrk: 1 - Property was found in the part section.

trans-unit.source: 2 - Property was found in the class section.

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Property was found in the class section.

target.mrk: 2 - Property was found in the class section.

trans-unit.source: 3 - Property was found in the list of global variables.

seg-source.mrk: 3 - Property was found in the list of global variables.

target.mrk: 3 - Property was found in the list of global variables.

trans-unit.source: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

target.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.
